tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE storage_space (
    space_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_id INT,
    space_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    capacity DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES cross_docking_facility(facility_id)
);

CREATE TABLE storage_spaces (
    space_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_id INT NOT NULL,
    space_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    capacity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES cross_docking_facility_layouts(facility_id)
);

CREATE TABLE product_inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    space_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (space_id) REFERENCES storage_spaces(space_id)
);
